description: Cross-machine GitHub-aware branch coordination dashboard — registry sync via Supabase, GitHub API branch/PR/CI awareness, unified multi-repo view, and visual dashboard

existing_infra: GitHub MCP Server (branches, PRs, CI, commits)

F1_supabase_registry_sync.title: Sync local .spidersan/registry.json to Supabase with machine_id tagging

F2_github_branch_inventory.title: GitHub API integration — fetch branches, PRs, CI status for configured repos

F3_cross_machine_conflict_detection.title: Unified conflict detection across machines and repos using synced registries

F4_smart_sync_advisor.title: Push/pull/stale advisor — recommend git operations per repo per machine

F5_dashboard_tui.title: Terminal dashboard — cross-repo branch tree with conflict heatmap and sync status

F6_dashboard_web.title: FlockView integration — web dashboard for visual branch management

test_gate.description: All feature tests must pass before QA

qa_gate.description: End-to-end: M1 registers branch → Supabase sync → M2 sees conflict → GitHub PR status matches → dashboard renders correctly
